configuration.tbelScript:
var temperature_1m = toFixed(Math.random() * 10 + 15, 2);       // 15 - 25 °C
var humidity_1m = toFixed(Math.random() * 40 + 40, 2);          // 40 - 80 %
var pressure_1m = toFixed(Math.random() * 20 + 1000, 2);        // 1000 - 1020 hPa
var windSpeed_1m = toFixed(Math.random() * 15, 2);              // 0 - 15 m/s
var windDirection_1m = toFixed(Math.random() * 360, 0);         // 0 - 360 grados
var radiation_1m = toFixed(Math.random() * 800 + 200, 2);       // 200 - 1000 W/m²
var precipitation_24h = toFixed(Math.random() * 50, 2);         // 0 - 50 mm en 24h
var batteryLevel_1m = toFixed(Math.random() * 24, 2); // 0 - 24 Voltios

var msg = {
    temperature_1m: temperature_1m,
    humidity_1m: humidity_1m,
    pressure_1m: pressure_1m,
    windSpeed_1m: windSpeed_1m,
    windDirection_1m: windDirection_1m,
    radiation_1m: radiation_1m,
    precipitation_24h:precipitation_24h,
    batteryLevel_1m: batteryLevel_1m
};

var metadata = { data: 40 };
var msgType = "POST_TELEMETRY_REQUEST";

return { msg: msg, metadata: metadata, msgType: msgType };
